subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Astros’ Carlos Correa hit two home runs, but he committed a key fielding error in the eighth inning that allowed the Royals to tie the game and go on to win. The deciding game will be Wednesday in Kansas City.
snippet: The Astros’ Carlos Correa hit two home runs, but he committed a key fielding error in the eighth inning that allowed the Royals to tie the game and go on to win. The deciding game will be Wednesday in Kansas City.
